column2: "Thank you for your report. Let's have a look... Yes, this should do."
"I hereby raise the difficulty limit on your missions, <%me>."
"Now, some advice just for you. Now that your difficulty cap has been lifted, your battles will become harder from here on out."
"Even the hostiles you easily dealt with before will be far stronger and are sure to turn their attentions toward you."

"A new Client Order is available for Lottie.

Lottie can be found in the Shop Area, south passage."

"A new Client Order is available for Lubert.

Lubert can be found in the Shop Area, south passage."

"A new Client Order is available for Klotho.

Klotho can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
